description: Italy's coronavirus death toll jumps by 133 in a day to 366, as millions adapt to new restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Italy death toll soars amid travel ban
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy death toll soars amid travel ban - BBC News
maintext: "We want to guarantee the health of our citizens. We understand that these measures will impose sacrifices, sometimes small and sometimes very big," Prime Minister Conte said as he announced the measures in the middle of Saturday night.
